dialog: Once upon a time, Cleetus the Yeetus and his brother, PLACE HOLDER, lived happily together on farmland right next to a forest, far from the city.
Day goes by and nothing interesting ever happened, does it?

Yeetus's brother went into the forest and found an artifact that wraped between time and place, inside a cave full with aggressive bugs and toxic shroom. While he was playing with that device, he was ambushed by bugs and locked him somewhere inside the cave.
That artifact was dropped inside forest, and soon picked up by Yeetus when he was looking for his brother.
Yeetus realized that his brother was captured, so he grabs his trusty shotgun, BFG2k20 and headed into the cave to rescue him brother.....

speaker: Yeetus
dialog: I need to find a way to get in. Maybe this device can help.
